alert.note: Alert for Person (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 11:31PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Person County through 1230 AM EDT... At 1128 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Milton to near Mayfield to Eden. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Roxboro, Concord, Bethel Hill, Hyco Lake, Mayo Reservoir and Hyco Marina. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Prolonged heavy rainfall may also occur with these training storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
